name: Piñata Simulador 2015 - Tacos Edition
description:
[This prototype can be played with a Wiimote]

First of all, blindfold your eyes and ask your friends to guide your movements on the screen. Now you can hit. And hit. And hit again. How many candies will you get ? How many people will get killed in your quest for sugar ?

The prototype was made during the Game, Sun & Jam organized by Game IN. The theme was : "Obey must be a pleasure"

Team : Jérémy Deschamps, Romain Lemaire, Maximilien Dehove, Nicolas Launay
